## packet network assign-ip

Assign IP address to a device by ID

### Synopsis


Assign IP address to a device by ID

```
packet network assign-ip
```

### Options

```
      --address string     IP address.(format: x.x.x.x/y)
      --device-id string   ID of device to assign to
```
